response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment in your future endeavors. I am offering it to you at a special price of $800,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 800000}
